name: koi-goal-keeper
description: The Koi Goal Keeper makes goal planning a breeze.

scripts.predeploy: pnpm run build && pnpm -r --filter ./apps/backend run copyFrontend && docker build apps -t jondeates/koi-goal-keeper:$npm_package_version -t jondeates/koi-timer:latest
